name: Dicey (Fabzter)
description:
Dicey How to play

Click on the arrows with you LEFT MOUSE to move the dice.

Use the LEFT and RIGHT keys to rotate the camera.

If a tile has a number, you must move the dice with the number corresponding to the number on the tile.

Your goal is to reach the BLUE tile.

Background

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 with the theme: ROLL OF THE DICE.

Things to add in the future

- Online Scoreboard

- Soundtrack

- level idea:

  • Add a button that open new path
  • Add a button that increment tile number
  • more power ups (No damage on next tile, all side of dice are blank)
Credit
